org.apache.spark

Class MapOutputTracker

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.MapOutputTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logging
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapOutputTrackerMaster, MapOutputTrackerWorker

    public abstract class MapOutputTracker
extends Object
implements Logging
    Class that keeps track of the location of the map output of a stage. This is abstract because different versions of MapOutputTracker (driver and executor) use different HashMap to store its metadata.

      • getEpoch

        public long getEpoch()
        Called to get current epoch number.

      • updateEpoch

        public void updateEpoch(long newEpoch)
        Called from executors to update the epoch number, potentially clearing old outputs because of a fetch failure. Each executor task calls this with the latest epoch number on the driver at the time it was created.

      • unregisterShuffle

        public void unregisterShuffle(int shuffleId)
        Unregister shuffle data.

        public void stop()
        Stop the tracker.
